title: Drop scones
ingredients: ['125 g (4 1⁄2 oz) self-raising flour', '2 tsp caster sugar', '1 egg, beaten', '1 tbsp melted unsalted butter', '150 ml (5 fl oz) semi-skimmed milk', '4 tsp sunflower oil', 'To serve', '100 g (3 1⁄2 oz) blueberries', '1 tsp clear honey', '100 g (3 1⁄2 oz) raspberries', '200 g (7 oz) fromage frais']
